study_plan_entry.title: Theory development in corporate strategy & technological innovation

free_text.Learning outcomes: This is a corporate strategy doctoral seminar that explores those elements of technological innovation that underpin the attainment, reinforcement, and erosion of competitive advantage.  Note that the competitive advantage in this case can and often is temporary.  The emphasis of the course will be on writing rather than criticizing published articles.
free_text.Content: We will use different theoretical perspectives (industrial organization, evolutionary economics, transaction cost eceonomics, networks, population ecology, etc.) to explore the impact of technological innovation on the conduct and performance of firms as well as the industries in which the firms operate.
free_text.Note: The course will be held in 2010.
